subject: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON
FINANCIAL MATTERS)

Date. 16/01/2024

Attention Beneficiary, Mr Peter Palmer

We are hereby informing you regarding the transaction concerning
your outstanding  fund which you are having with the Bank in Ivory
Coast which was discovered through our network gazette. And So Far So
Good, An Approval Has Been Made Today On Your Behalf

Please If There Are Any Kind Of Questions You Wish To Ask, Do Not
Hesitate To Ask. And Mind You, A Warning Has Been Issued To You, Never
To Respond To Any Body Again Word Wide Except The United Nation Gives
You The Authority And Order To Do So, Otherwise, Your Funds Will Be
Automatically Blocked By The United Nation.

Below Is The Bank Approved By The United Nation To Make The Necessary
outstanding Compensation Payment Through ATM CARD delivery to your
home mailing address

Mr. Sarata KONE -THIAM
Foreign Remittance Director,
UBA BANK COTE D’IVOIRE
Banque internationale pour l'Afrique occidentale Côte d'Ivoire
UBA GROUP - COTE D’IVOIRE.
Email:    ubafinancialinstitute2019@gmail.com
Alternative.      ubabankplc252@yahoo.com
Tell:  +225 07 68 522 164
Adresse géo: 8-10,avenue Joseph Anoma Plateau Abidjan Côte d'Ivoire



We are waiting to hear from you to enable us commence as instructed by
the authorities.

SINCERELY YOURS,


MRS. MARY  JOHNSON.
UNITED NATIONS  SECRETARY FOR PEACEKEEPING FORCE MISSION ON FINANCIAL
MATTERS.IVORY COAST ABIDJAN.
Direct Line...+225 05 05 70 23 98

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this fund in Ivory Coast. I must admit, I'm a bit surprised as I wasn't aware of any funds under my name there.

Could you please provide more details about this? How was it discovered and why is it under my name? Also, could you explain more about the role of the United Nations in this matter?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this fund in Ivory Coast. I must admit, I'm a bit surprised as I don't recall having any connections with a bank there.

Could you please provide more details about this fund? How was it discovered and why is it associated with my name? Also, could you explain the role of Mr. Sarata Kone in this process?

I appreciate your warning about not responding to anyone else regarding this matter. However, could you clarify how the United Nations is involved in this situation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
Hello My Dear, I have heard what you said and all are noted with care as
you stated. As a matter of fact, you where chosen by the IMF, then was
introduced to the United Nation to take control for the said programme of
Compersation in your favor

It happens that your name among others 6 people where shown. And out of the
7 of you, 5 has completed their notification and by this week Friday their
ATM CARD will be delivered to their home mailing address with a success
arriving

So as a matter of fact, Kindly contact the UBA BANK as was given to you
today to contact so that yours own ATM CARD will also be among the ones
leaving by Friday this week to its various destinations


Yours sincerely

Mrs Mary Johnson

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this program and that my name was chosen by the IMF and introduced to the United Nation. I'm curious, how did they come across my name? 

Also, could you please provide more details about this ATM card? What is its purpose and how does it work? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this opportunity from the IMF and United Nations. I'm curious, how was my name chosen for this program? And could you please explain a bit more about what the ATM card is for?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's quite a surprise to hear that my name was chosen by the IMF and introduced to the United Nations. I'm curious, how did this selection process take place? 

You mentioned an ATM card being delivered to my home mailing address. Could you please provide more details about this? What is the purpose of this ATM card and how does it relate to the programme?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Also, could you please provide more details about the ATM card? What is its purpose and how does it work?

subject: Re: FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS)
body:
Raymond <qe65647@***.com>



FROM UNITED NATIONS OFFICE OF INTERNATIONAL OVERSIGHT SERVICES INTERNAL
AUDIT, MONITORING, CONSULTING AND INVESTIGATIONS DIVISION ON FINANCIAL
MATTERS.

FROM: MRS. MARY JOHNSON(.SECRETARY UN AUDIT MONITORING UNIT ON FINANCIAL
MATTERS)

Date. 08/02/2024

We have heard what you said, and also remember that this programme is only
10days to be finalised. If not, the ATM CARD will be returned back to the
IMF for refusal of claim by the beneficiary. So it is better you contact
the UBA BANK for further details before it is too late.

Dear start counting from the day you were contacted and today presently.
How many days have gone out of the 10 days given ? So calculate it yourself


SINCERELY YOURS,


MRS. MARY  JOHNSON.
UNITED NATIONS  SECRETARY FOR PEACE KEEPING FORCE MISSION ON FINANCIAL
MATTERS.IVORY COAST ABIDJAN.
Direct Line...+225 05 05 70 23 98
